MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL54 and LL55 postcode areas of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Waenfawr and surrounding areas. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:41PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area  and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 5:50PM on 27th November 2020
